page.title: 12BURGHFIELD AREA RELIGIONS
page.content: In Burghfield Common (B.C) there are only places of worship for the Christian Faith,although there are churches for Anglicans,Roman Catholics and Methodists. The largest group is the Anglican,or Church of England,movement.Their main church is St.Mary the Virgin in Burgh- field,whose parish extends into B.C. Part of the Diocese of Oxford and the Deanary of Reading,the minister is Rev.J.Morrison who lives in B.C.The church has a Sunday school and runs two youth clubs.It also has the parish graveyard. Part of the village also lies in the parish of St.Mary's in Sulhamstead Abbots.This building is much smaller than the Burghfield church,dates back to the 13th century,and has a wooden tower.The minister is Rev.M.Watts,who lives in Ufton Nervet.
